title: Imagination-Based Problem-Based Learning (PBL) Instructional Innovation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Principles of PBL (Project-Based Learning) and Experience in Analyzing Social Issues
context.additional_context: Students develop social problem-solving competencies through PBL activities utilizing imagination—such as poetry creation, song composition, and role-play production—and analyze innovative pedagogical methods based on their experiences as peer evaluators

learning_goals: Students can propose three or more creative problem-solving solutions through imagination-based PBL activities
Perform peer evaluator roles and analyze instructional effectiveness using five or more specific criteria
Produce role-plays/poems/songs addressing social issues to convey learning content with ≥80% accuracy
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
